title: Adolescence and learning disabilities (TEFC)
creator_credit: Lawren Productions and Thomas G. Gregory
brief_description: Promotes general guidelines for understanding and helping the teenager with learning problems. Interviews professionals and specialists who deal with learning-disabled teenagers, and with the adolescents themselves.
